Committee: Veterans, Homeland Security And Military Affairs

Milestones.Committee: Veterans, Homeland Security And Military Affairs

Actions.Text: REFERRED TO VETERANS, HOMELAND SECURITY AND MILITARY AFFAIRS

Title: Requires the department of motor vehicles compile a list of veterans who apply for a veteran driver's license
Summary: Requires the department of motor vehicles compile a list of veterans who apply for a veteran driver's license and provide such list to the department of veterans' services to aid in outreach efforts by the department of veterans' services.
LawCode: Add ยง504-a, V & T L; amd ยง4, Veterans' Services L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law and the veterans' services law, in relation to requiring the department of motor vehicles share certain veteran information with the department of veterans' services
